body:
I wanted to make this topic because I found users in this servers have pretty random names.
Why did you choose them!?!?!?
I chose mine because that's how my friends named me in school :P I added the MC, well, for Minecraft ._. xD

replies.body: I am 50% American, 50% Kiwi (person from New Zealand).  So I am a Tarheel fan (American part of my name "Tarheel") and kiwi (because my father is from New Zeland "Kiwi") so I came up with Tarheelkiwi.  Dat logic doe.

I would <3 to change my name!

replies.body:
When I was 9, I loved COD so much. I had all the merchandise. I would pray to COD every night. While I was praying, my dad walked in. He called me a noob. I said he had no swag. He 360 no scop'd me and sent me to bed. I was crying, hoping for COD to save me. Then all of the sudden, I feel something touch me. 

It's iiTeMpeR, owner of FaZe clan.

I am so happy. He comes closer to me and whispers in my ear... "This is my clan". He then puts me on my hands and knees. I spread my ass cheeks for iiTeMpeR. He penetrates my defenses with his lengthy Potato Masher. He thrusts his mighty weapon into my artillery cannon. It hurts so much, but I do it for iiTeMpeR. He roars a battle cry as he brings down my barrier. 

My dad walks in. He sees iiTeMpeR. "wtf". iiTeMpeR says...

"Your mum's going down".

He 420 bl4z3 its out my window.

Just remember....

















































That's where I got my name from.

replies.body:
I choose my username because one of my hobbies was marine biology.

A Blue Cichlid is just a type of fish found in Africa and South America. My name is pronounced "Blue-sick-lid".

Look at this cutey pie, don't you just want to kiss it?

replies.body:
I came up with mine out of absolutely nowhere.
My weird ass brain just decided 'OPTOBAT',
although when i thought of this name i was not active on multiplayer, only singleplayer, so i wasn't really going for anything special in terms of names.

I remember back when i played multiplayer once or twice in 2011, i named my
dude 'snoopyhawk' XD

The snoopy part was random, but the 'hawk' part comes from the first part of my last name :)

replies.body:
There's this shooting game franchise called Uncharted, which you may or may not know about, and I played Uncharted 3 a couple of years back and loved it, so I got the full game and still play it now, occasionally. And the best player in the entire franchise (1,2 and 3) is:

http://www.naughtydog.com/stats/uncharted3_search/iBiZa_TwisT

And he has inspired me as a gamer, so I incorporated iBiZa and Minecraft in my name :D

My stats btw c:

http://www.naughtydog.com/stats/uncharted3_search/rhysdude70

replies.body:
My Clash of Clans name was bear777787, so I needed change. Me and my dad came up with this. My favorite thing then was airplanes, and my dad is Indian, so i asked what airplane was in hindi, and it was jahaj, and I was 12 at the time so therefore: jahaj12.
Btw bear777787 came from my favorite animal and 777 and 787 were some airplane names.
